name: Totodile
author: Miki Tanaka
flavor_text: Its highly developed jaws are powerful enough to crush anything. Even experienced adult trainers must handle it with great caution.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to Totodile but not used to pay for this attack’s Energy cost. You can’t add more than 20 damage in this way.
